doc.title: PANASONIC UNVEILS SC-GN01  WEARABLE IMMERSIVE GAMING SPEAKER SYSTEM
doc.titleEn: PANASONIC UNVEILS SC-GN01  WEARABLE IMMERSIVE GAMING SPEAKER SYSTEM
doc.body:
PANASONIC UNVEILS SC-GN01  WEARABLE IMMERSIVE GAMING SPEAKER SYSTEM (WIGSS) 
Level up your gaming experience than ever before
・Designed in collaboration with FINAL FANTASY® XIV Online(Sound Director Masayoshi Soken and Audio Editor Go Kinuya from SQUARE ENIX® Co., Ltd) 
・Dedicated gaming modes: 3 distinct sound to further heighten the experience. 
・Truly Realistic sounds with original True MAGESS technology equipped with 4-ch full range speakers. 
・Unique wearable ergonomic design: supports the HIFI sound field that places footsteps, gunfire and other critical sound effects accurately. It allows you to enjoy for long time in full comfort. 
・Equipped with a high-performance noise and echo cancelling dual microphone for clear chats.
doc.bodyEn:
PANASONIC UNVEILS SC-GN01  WEARABLE IMMERSIVE GAMING SPEAKER SYSTEM (WIGSS)
 Level up your gaming experience than ever before
・Designed in collaboration with FINAL FANTASY® XIV Online(Sound Director Masayoshi Soken and Audio Editor Go Kinuya from SQUARE ENIX® Co., Ltd) 
・Dedicated gaming modes: 3 distinct sound to further heighten the experience. 
・Truly Realistic sounds with original True MAGESS technology equipped with 4-ch full range speakers. 
・Unique wearable ergonomic design: supports the HIFI sound field that places footsteps, gunfire and other critical sound effects accurately. It allows you to enjoy for long time in full comfort. 
・Equipped with a high-performance noise and echo cancelling dual microphone for clear chats.

doc.title: DNGFES in TGS2021 ONLINE
doc.body:
2021年10月1日(金)から10月3日(日)にかけて開催される「東京ゲームショウ 2021（TGS2021）」に、DetonatioN Gaming主催のeスポーツ番組「DNGFES in TGS2020 ONLINE」を出展いたします！
「DNG FES in TGS 2021 ONLINE」では、各種タイトルを対象に、視聴者参加型の番組の放映や大会を実施いたします。視聴者・参加者の皆さまに豪華賞品のご用意もありますので、是非お気軽にご参加ください。
doc.bodyEn:
We will exhibit the e-sports program "DNGFES in TGS2020 ONLINE" sponsored by DetonatioN Gaming at the "Tokyo Game Show 2021 (TGS2021)" to be held from October 1st (Friday) to October 3rd (Sunday), 2021!
In "DNG FES in TGS 2021 ONLINE", viewer participation type programs and competitions will be held for various titles. We also have luxurious prizes for viewers and participants, so please feel free to join us.

doc.exhibitKana: スタリー　シーウィード　ゲーム　スタジオ
doc.exhibitGroupName: インディーゲーム（選考出展）
doc.title: 【初参加】《流光記憶の灰 Grayscale Memories》短編物語3Dゲーム
doc.titleEn: [First Time to TGS] Grayscale Memories: Short storytelling 3D game
doc.body:
はじめまして。台湾を拠点とするインディーゲームチーム、Starry Seaweed Game StudioのNoriです。現在は個人開発をしています。
今回、初めてTGSに参加します。インディーゲーム「選考出展」に選ばたことをとても光栄に思います。
私の作品を紹介させていただきます。

《流光記憶の灰 Grayscale Memories》は、多くのJRPGからアイデアを得た実験的な短編物語3Dゲームです。
孤独な魂は居場所を見つけられるのか？
4つの方向キーと片手のみを駆使し、失敗や死を恐れることなくさまざまなゲームプレイを楽しみながら物語全体をシームレスに体験できます。
Steamでは日本語、英語、繁体字中国語の3言語に対応しています。また、10分間の無料体験版も用意しています。

ぜひこのゲームをプレイして、建設的なコメントをいただけると幸いです。
よろしくお願いいたします。
doc.bodyEn:
Hello, I'm Nori from Starry Seaweed Game Studio, which is a Taiwan-based indie game team, and I'm solo-developing now.
It's my first time participating in TGS, and I'm excited to be selected in the Indie Game Selected Exhibit.
Let me introduce my work.

Grayscale Memories is an experimental short story-telling 3D game inspired by many JRPGs.
Can a lonely spirit find where it belongs?
You can use only 4 arrow keys and a single hand to play many kinds of gameplay, without worrying fail or death, and can seamlessly experience the full story.
Now available on Steam with language support of English, Japanese, and Traditional Chinese.
The whole gameplay is about 45-60 minutes.
I also prepared a free 10-minute trial version.

I would appreciate it if you could come to play and give me some constructive feedback. Thank you.

doc.title: AppTweak ASOツール、簡体字中国語と韓国語に対応開始
doc.titleEn: AppTweak ASO Tool Now Available in Simplified Chinese & Korean
doc.body:
国際的なモバイルアプリ市場の巨大な成長に伴い、世界中のアプリやゲームの成功を促進するために、App Store Optimization（ASO）がますます必要になっています。

AppTweakは、APAC地域の既存顧客および見込み顧客のアプリ成長を促進するために、誰もがそのサービスにアクセスできるよう努めています。その結果、AppTweakのウェブサイトとASOツールが、簡体字中国語と韓国語で利用できるようになったことをお知らせします。
doc.bodyEn:
With the immense growth of the international mobile app market, App Store Optimization (ASO) is becoming increasingly necessary to promote the success of apps and games around the world. AppTweak, the #1 ASO tool driven by data science, empowers mobile leaders - such as Amazon, Jam City, Yelp, and Adobe - to grow their apps and games with actionable insights in a simple interface.
To facilitate app growth for its existing clients and prospective customers in the APAC region, AppTweak works hard to make its services accessible to all. As a result, AppTweak is pleased to announce that its website and ASO tool are now available in Simplified Chinese and Korean (as well as English, French, and Japanese)!

doc.title: App ApeとAppTweak、モバイルゲームに関する白書を発行
doc.titleEn: AppTweak and App Ape Publish White Paper: Japan's Mobile Game Market 2021: Usage Data and App Store Optimization (ASO) Trends
doc.body:
本白書では、フラーが提供するアプリ分析サービス「App Ape (アップ・エイプ)」のデータと、AppTweakのASOインサイトを統合。2021年の日本のモバイルゲーム市場でサービスを成長させるための新たな視点やアクショナブルなインサイトをふんだんに盛り込みました。

日本のモバイルゲーム市場に関する白書は、下記のページから無料でダウンロードできます。

日本のモバイルゲーム市場に関する白書を入手する：
https://www.apptweak.com/ja/aso-resources/japan-mobile-game-market-2021

日本のモバイルゲーム市場でのサービス拡大に役立つ指標が満載

新規参入するアプリ開発者の増加により、日本のモバイルゲーム市場の競争環境は年を追うごとに厳しさを増しています。競争激化に伴い、日本におけるアプリユーザーの特性を理解し、アプリ運営やマーケティングに活用するためのデータ分析の必要性も急速に高まっています。

App Apeは市場全体のトレンドやアプリユーザーに関するデータを、AppTweakはアプリストア最適化（ASO）を中心とした価値のあるデータをそれぞれの顧客に提供しています。いずれもモバイル業界で必要とされるデータで、業界トレンドの把握や成長機会に関するインサイト、ユーザーの行動に関する重要な情報の特定や、ビジネス・マーケティング施策に関するアクショナブルなインサイトとして役立ちます。

本白書では両サービスが保有するデータを基に、アプリダウンロード数・売上分析や性別年代別分析、パブリッシャー分析、最も検索されたキーワードなどを掲載しています。アプリの開発者はもちろんのこと、アプリを活用したビジネスに関わる幅広い方々に有用な内容となっております。ぜひお手に取ってご覧ください。
doc.bodyEn:
App Ape, the Japanese provider of analytics and market insights on mobile apps, and AppTweak, the #1 ASO tool for apps and games driven by data science, are pleased to announce the release of an exclusive white paper: Japan's Mobile Game Market 2021.

As more and more app developers hope to localize their apps and games for a variety of countries, languages, and markets, the need for analytical insights is undeniable. Tools offering data-driven insights about the mobile industry not only provide information on consumer behaviors, but also help app marketers understand trends and identify growth opportunities.

To get your free copy of the white paper, click this link: (https://www.apptweak.com/en/aso-resources/japan-mobile-game-market-2021)

doc.title: 【初参加】AppTweak: モバイルアプリ＆ゲーム向け No. 1 ASOツール
doc.titleEn: AppTweak: #1 ASO Tool for Apps & Games Driven by Data Science
doc.body:
AppTweakは、データサイエンスを活用した最先端のASO対策ツールです。 Amazon、Jam City、Yelp、Adobeのモバイルリーダーを含め、導入企業数は1,500社以上。シンプルなインターフェースで実用的なインサイトを提供し、アプリやゲームを成長させます。
ASOインテリジェンス、広告インテリジェンス、アプリインテリジェンス、マーケットインテリジェンスを包括したオールインワンプラットフォームを提供します。
App Growth Awardsコミュニティで「Best ASO Tool」を受賞し、Deloitte Belgium's Fast 50 competitionでは、6番目に急成長しているテクノロジー企業として評価されました。2014年の設立以来、AppTweakは、ブリュッセル、サンフランシスコ、東京、ベンガルールにオフィスを構え、世界各地のお客様にサービスを提供しています。
doc.bodyEn:
AppTweak is the leading ASO tool driven by data science. AppTweak empowers mobile leaders - such as Amazon, Jam City, Yelp and Adobe - to grow their apps and games with actionable insights in a simple interface. 
 
Committed to developing the most accurate, transparent and easy-to-use ASO tool on the market, AppTweak supports over 1,500 app developers and game publishers worldwide. AppTweak’s all-in-one platform offers ASO Intelligence, Ad Intelligence, App Intelligence and Market Intelligence.
 
AppTweak has been awarded the “Best ASO Tool” by the App Growth Awards community and was recognized as the 6th Fastest-Growing Technology Company in Deloitte Belgium’s Fast 50 competition. Launched in 2014, AppTweak serves customers from all corners of the world, with offices in Brussels, San Francisco, Tokyo and Bengaluru.

doc.exhibitName: エム・ビー・エーインターナショナル
doc.exhibitKana: エム・ビー・エーインターナショナル
doc.title: 脱出忍者
doc.body: 脱出忍者」は怪しい城に閉じ込められた忍者を操作し、迷路を脱出するゲームです。隠れ身の術を使い、敵をよけながら、60階からスタートして1階を目指して脱出しましょう。
doc.bodyEn: "Escape Ninja" is a game where you control a ninja trapped in a suspicious castle and escape from the maze. Use the technique of hiding to avoid enemies, start from the 60th floor and escape to the 1st floor.

doc.title: 《OPUS：星歌の響き》発売開始・日本版トレーラー公開のお知らせ
doc.titleEn: Opus: Echo of Starsong arrives on PC
doc.body:
《OPUS：星歌の響き》全編日本語のトレーラーと、Steamでの発売が開始されました。ー別れの決まった物語ー

[PressImage00]
https://drive.google.com/file/d/152qPVlEdWIJnXmErx6MJigYYmJ20ByIp/view?usp=sharing

台湾インディーズゲームスタジオ SIGONO が送る最新のアドベンチャーゲーム《OPUS：星歌の響き》の販売が正式にSteamで開始され、同時に全編日本語のトレーラーも公開されました。

《OPUS：星歌の響き》 は、オリエンタルな風合いを持ったスペースアドベンチャータイプのゲームです。「龍脈」が引き寄せた少年少女が、別れの決まった冒険の旅に出る…伝説の「龍脈」を探す為、プレイヤーは龍脈を見つけ出す歌声を持つ少女と一緒に旅に出ます。彼女の歌声で数々の謎を解き進めれば、この宇宙に太古から存在する神話の謎が解ける事でしょう。

ゲームプロデューサー「ブライアン」より一言：　

このゲームの開発の為に、我々のスタジオは実に２年半もの時間を費やしました。　
少年少女が如何にして運命を克服し、困難と悲劇に立ち向かう勇気を得るか…この物語を通じて、プレイヤーの皆様に少しでも伝える事ができれば本望です。
ゲームで泣いても笑っても、それが前に進む力になる…我々の全身全霊が詰まったゲームです。どうぞお楽しみください！

《OPUS：星歌の響き》｜ゲームPV（発売開始版）https://youtu.be/JpNRCYiZFzE
《OPUS：星歌の響き》Steam ページhttps://store.steampowered.com/app/1504500/OPUS_Echo_of_Starsong/

《OPUS：星歌の響き》は随所にオリエンタルな要素を取り入れました。ゲーム中のデザインでも随所でそれが見て取れることでしょう。

[PressImage01]
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IxivNpdtj1So1H6kG__PKTonPNx_q1_n/view?usp=sharing

 主人公を操作し、歌声で宇宙に眠る龍脈を探し出しましょう。

[PressImage02]
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dTceYodRtQtwExE4w5iWmzPVyKcyUm-N/view?usp=sharing

 小惑星の奥深に眠る古代龍脈文明の秘密を紐解いていきます。 

[PressImage03]
https://drive.google.com/file/d/16sBhmwc479na7et5QE7SWDI1TfZWf6wa/view?usp=sharing

宇宙船は自由に改造可能です。太陽系の各地を隅々まで旅しましょう！

[PressImage04]
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_U8XLc0VbHSvwPkvHS-VHfs0MCGgjI5X/view?usp=sharing

サウンドトラックも同時発売中です
《OPUS：星歌の響き》のサウンドトラックはデジタルアルバムとして、オンラインで同時発売されています。ゲーム内で使用された珠玉の32曲を収録しました。
台湾の“Golden Bell Awards” で最優秀を獲得した作曲家「Triodust」と、米国の”The Golden Globe Awards ceremony”受賞者である「許家維」の両名が紡ぐサウンドが、龍脈の奥深き世界観を見事に表現いたしました。

[PressImage05]
https://drive.google.com/file/d/16ct1-o8mYvcADrcIYzn81yjYydWJ7Sug/view?usp=sharing
doc.bodyEn:
Indie game studio Sigono have released their new narrative adventure Opus: Echo of Starsong on PC via Steam. The game is the third installment in the multi-award-winning Opus anthology series, following previous titles Opus: The Day we Found Earth and Opus: Rocket of Whispers.

Opus: Echo of Starsong follows Eda and Jun, two star-crossed adventurers who team up to uncover the source of a mysterious outer space radiance known as the ‘Starsong’. Gameplay moves between visual novel style storytelling, puzzle-solving, galaxy charting, space navigating, and third person exploration, as Eda and Jun chart a course to the heart of the galaxy.

Featuring:
Seeing is believing - A distinct blend of hand-drawn illustrations and low-poly art lend an eerie beauty to a war-torn, lawless galaxy.
Starstruck heroes - Follow protagonists Jun and Eda as they explore forgotten corners of the galaxy and unravel the truth behind an ancient myth. 
Space Opera - Thoughtful sound design and beautifully composed music weaves into the story of the mysterious ‘Starsong’. 
Stronger Together - Use Eda’s voice to locate the elusive asteroid temples, and then disembark as Jun to explore and solve the puzzles within. 
Motley crew - Meet a diverse cast of enemies and allies on the journey, each with a backstory tied to the troubled history of the solar system. 
Don’t lose your way - Manage the ship’s resources and upgrade it as you chart a path through the stars, crossing into unknown and dangerous territory.

‘I’m very proud to finally present Opus: Echo of Starsong to the world,’ says Scott Chen, co-founder of Sigono. ‘Our development team has put all of their skill and heart together to create a story that will resonate with players for years to come.’

doc.exhibitKana: ミン　イェン　ウー
doc.exhibitGroupName: インディーゲーム（選考出展）
doc.title: 《飄移 : 羽毛的重量》 獲得 巴哈姆特 ACG 金賞及最佳技術獎！
doc.titleEn: 《Drifting: Weight of Feathers》Won Bahamut ACG Gold Medal Award!
doc.body:
我想跟大家分享一個好消息！

我的遊戲剛剛(2021/08/14)獲得了 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作金賞以及最佳技術獎！
（連結：https://prj.gamer.com.tw/acgaward/2021/award_game.php）

第十屆巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽總共收錄 501 件參賽作品；273 件作品入選第二輪評審，包括動畫組 110 件；漫畫組 93 件；（電腦和手機）遊戲組 70 件。

很興奮能看見我的遊戲 《飄移 : 羽毛的重量》 入選電腦遊戲組金賞！

謝謝大家一直以來關注 《飄移 : 羽毛的重量》 開發進度到今天，我會努力帶給大家更流暢愉快的遊戲體驗！

如果你還沒玩過 《飄移 : 羽毛的重量》 試玩版，請下載遊戲親自體驗看看！
（連結：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1378350）
doc.bodyEn:
Hello Everyone!

I like to share a great news with you!

My game just (2021/08/14) won the Bahamut ACG Gold Medal Award and Best Tech Award!
(link: https://prj.gamer.com.tw/acgaward/2021/award_game.php)

The 10th Bahamut ACG competition received a total of 501 ACG artworks; Among the 501 participants, 273 were selected to enter the second round, which includes 110 anime films, 93 manga, and 70 (pc/app) games. 

I'm thrilled to see my game 《Drifting : Weight of Feathers》 was picked by the jury panel as first place in the pc game category!     

Thank you all for following the development of 《Drifting : Weight of Feathers》 to this day, I'll do my best to deliver a smooth and enjoyable gameplay experience!

If you haven't played 《Drifting : Weight of Feathers》 demo , give it a try and experience it yourself!
(link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1378350)

doc.exhibitKana: エヌピーシーケーシー　スタジオ
doc.exhibitGroupName: インディーゲーム（選考出展）
doc.title: ノベルゲーム3部作のコレクション『A YEAR OF SPRINGS』
doc.titleEn: A YEAR OF SPRINGS, a visual novel trilogy
doc.body:
春は三度来る。三人の女性と三つの物語。

npckc studioによる新作『A YEAR OF SPRINGS』は三人の女友達の物語です。愛したい、繋がりたい、受け入れてもらいたいという感情をナビゲートするノベルゲーム3部作のコレクションです。

ONE NIGHT, HOT SPRINGSでは不安や緊張感を抱くトランスジェンダーの女性・鈴木ハルが温泉に行きます。

LAST DAY OF SPRINGでは友達想いの元不良・永田エリカがハルのためにスパ旅行を企画します。

SPRING LEAVES NO FLOWERSでは箱入りの女子大学生・立花愛美が友達や彼氏と楽しい一日を過ごします。

東京ゲームショウで体験版がプレイできます。
doc.bodyEn:
Three women, three stories, three springs.

Experience the stories of Haru, Erika, and Manami in A YEAR OF SPRINGS, a visual novel trilogy by npckc studio about a trio of friends navigating their feelings of love, connection, and just wanting to belong.

Play the demo at Tokyo Game Show's online exhibit.

doc.exhibitKana: ザ　シックスス　ハマー
doc.title: GALACTIC SOCCER COMES TO MOO LANDER’S MOOLTIPLAYER
doc.titleEn: GALACTIC SOCCER COMES TO MOO LANDER’S MOOLTIPLAYER
doc.body:
The talented Sixth Hammer team keeps bringing more unique fun action to Moo Lander! Their latest mooltiplayer mode is called “Galactic Mooball” and it brings the magic of soccer to the Mooltiverce of cosmic milk and universal cows.

The fantastic Euro soccer tournament 2020 may have come to pass, but in the world of Moo Lander, the football action is just beginning. We present to you our newest mooltiplayer local co-op mode – “The Galactic Mooball”. Choose your team, choose a Lander or a Mighty Cow, and get to the scoring! You have three minutes to score as many goals as possible, on some pretty crazy arenas with environmental obstacles, devices and treacherous terrain. The milky ball of bouncing milk-particles is yours to dominate.

As dedicated game developers and passionate gamers ourselves, we know the value and importance of a free game demo! So we want to present to all of you – our friends, fans and supporters, with the chance to experience the adventure that is Moo Lander. Both our personal adventure, and (we hope) yours as well. And remember – there is a cow level, be part of it! Download our free demo on Steam and try our cool game for yourselves.
doc.bodyEn:
The talented Sixth Hammer team keeps bringing more unique fun action to Moo Lander! Their latest mooltiplayer mode is called “Galactic Mooball” and it brings the magic of soccer to the Mooltiverce of cosmic milk and universal cows.

The fantastic Euro soccer tournament 2020 may have come to pass, but in the world of Moo Lander, the football action is just beginning. We present to you our newest mooltiplayer local co-op mode – “The Galactic Mooball”. Choose your team, choose a Lander or a Mighty Cow, and get to the scoring! You have three minutes to score as many goals as possible, on some pretty crazy arenas with environmental obstacles, devices and treacherous terrain. The milky ball of bouncing milk-particles is yours to dominate.

As dedicated game developers and passionate gamers ourselves, we know the value and importance of a free game demo! So we want to present to all of you – our friends, fans and supporters, with the chance to experience the adventure that is Moo Lander. Both our personal adventure, and (we hope) yours as well. And remember – there is a cow level, be part of it! Download our free demo on Steam and try our cool game for yourselves.

doc.exhibitKana: ザ　シックスス　ハマー
doc.title: MOO LANDER NEW DEMO OUT NOW!
doc.titleEn: MOO LANDER NEW DEMO OUT NOW!
doc.body:
Moo Lander has it all – unlockable battle abilities, worthy enemy AI, Cow boss battles, beautiful art style, self-recorded orchestral music, RPG elements, multiplayer and lots and lots of milk! And now you can experience these features with our new free demo on Steam. Just head over to our steam page, download, and start the fun.

Since our last demo iteration of Moo Lander, we have added awesome new features to the game – camouflage modes and Lander tech. Now you can unlock The Milk Shield, used to block enemy fire and deflect special projectiles, The Milk Saber to slash away at every hostile creature out there, and a completely new gameplay system – the camouflage modes! The full release is filled with all kinds of cool milk-based weapons and milk arsenal, so hang tight to 2022.

The cow bosses we call “The Ancient Mighty Cows” are back! And with brand new rework to our home-brewed cow AI no less. You can expect angrier, harder cows to battle, both in the Mooltiplayer arenas and in the signleplayer endgame. We’ve added some interesting cow species to the mooltiplayer choices, where you can play as the cow! Challenge yourself with our multi-phase cow boss battle, master The Lander’s tech to defeat them.
doc.bodyEn:
Moo Lander has it all – unlockable battle abilities, worthy enemy AI, Cow boss battles, beautiful art style, self-recorded orchestral music, RPG elements, multiplayer and lots and lots of milk! And now you can experience these features with our new free demo on Steam. Just head over to our steam page, download, and start the fun.

Since our last demo iteration of Moo Lander, we have added awesome new features to the game – camouflage modes and Lander tech. Now you can unlock The Milk Shield, used to block enemy fire and deflect special projectiles, The Milk Saber to slash away at every hostile creature out there, and a completely new gameplay system – the camouflage modes! The full release is filled with all kinds of cool milk-based weapons and milk arsenal, so hang tight to 2022.

The cow bosses we call “The Ancient Mighty Cows” are back! And with brand new rework to our home-brewed cow AI no less. You can expect angrier, harder cows to battle, both in the Mooltiplayer arenas and in the signleplayer endgame. We’ve added some interesting cow species to the mooltiplayer choices, where you can play as the cow! Challenge yourself with our multi-phase cow boss battle, master The Lander’s tech to defeat them.
